meta_description: Welcome to the Crocker Art Museum in downtown Sacramento, home to the world’s foremost display of California art from the Gold Rush to the present.
admission_text:
#  General Admission 

The Museum is open Wednesday through Sunday 10 AM to 5 PM with late hours Thursdays 10 AM to 9 PM. We are closed Monday, Tuesday, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day. 

Admission Prices:  
Adult $15  
Seniors (65 and older), College Student, and Military $10  
Youth (Ages 6 - 17) $8  
Child (Ages 5 and Under) Free  
  
**General Admission includes access to all exhibitions.**

[_Gift certificates available here._](https://my.crockerart.org/gift/certificate)

## Items

collections_text:
### On View

The Crocker is renowned for our European master drawings, international ceramics, and the world's foremost display of California art—but our collection spans far beyond.

[American Art, 1945 to Today](/art/collections/american-art-1945-to-today)

[Native American Art](/art/collections/native-american-art)

[American Art, 1800 to 1945](/art/collections/american-art-1800-to-1945)

[Asian Art](/art/collections/asian-art)

[European Art](/art/collections/european-art)

[Ceramics](/art/collections/ceramics)

[Oceanic Art](/art/collections/oceanic-art)

[African Art](/art/collections/african-art)

[Photography](/art/collections/photography)

[Art of the Ancient Americas](/art/collections/art-of-the-ancient-americas)
